name: Uplifting
description:
Build a space elevator and avoid hazards!

Numbers currently in the game are mostly based on just material costs and do not include wages, construction, etc. Most information used for calculations is from Space Elevators, a 350 page study by the IAA and wikipedia articles on launch vehicles such as the Delta IV, and Falcon 4.

Credits:

Programming: Matt Burton, Sean Murphy, Paul Weiler

Design:Nathan Strickland, Kevin Rucks

Art: Jen Melnick, Anthony Fariello

Thanks everyone, it was a lot of fun! If you have any questions leave 'em in the comments, there was a lot we just didn't have time to put in the game!

This was created at the IndieGalactic Space Jam.
